body:
Work with a team of back end, front end, QA and DevOps engineers to design, create, test and deploy applications.
 Develop services and applications using Java with the Spring Framework Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security, etc.
 Create application requirements and project documentation.
 Solve complex problems, create object models, define APIs, build web services, etc.
 Work directly with other developers and internal stakeholders to develop a solid understanding of the business application and requirements for which the application is being designed. A minimum of 2 years Java application development experience Strong in HTML5, CSS3
 Advance SQL/PLSQL knowledge
 Experience with a framework such as Angular, React, etc.
 Experience with Spring framework (MVC, Springboot, etc)
 Experience with REST services
 Experience with Agile methodology
 Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent amount of work experience Proven ability to build, manage and foster a team-oriented environment
 Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment
 Desire to work in an information systems environment
 Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills
 Excellent leadership and management skills
